column4: Latest;Oddar Mean Chey: In the commune of Osmach in  Samraong district of Oddar Meanchey province
column5: people continue to illegally log rosewood in Thai territory
column6: causing many citizens to be captured by Thai authorities.------On the evening of June 5
column9: a 32-year-old man from Deum Deum Village
column12: was arrested by Thai authorities along with two pieces of rosewood and will be prosecuted in Thailand.------Sources revealed that cross-border luxury wood merchants from Thailand in O’Smach district were the main drivers of the trade. The source said that the merchants have powerful backers on the Cambodian side border.------Some of the men involved are named in t------he source link------ (Khmer).
